ValidationRule.description: Ready for Contract should be true in order to proceed to contract stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE(StageName), 'Negotiate' ), ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Contract' ), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Ready_For_Contract__c , 'Yes' )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ready for contract should be true
